metadata.title: CVE-2019-18217 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: ProFTPD before 1.3.6b and 1.3.7rc before 1.3.7rc2 allows remoteunauthenticated denial-of-service due to incorrect handling of overly longcommands because main.c in a child process enters an infinite loop.

criterions.comment: proftpd-dfsg package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
